attributes.action: Please remove the Southeastern franchise once and for all!!
attributes.additional_details:
It is now at the stage where trains are delayed and cancelled every day without fail, causing everyone stress and grief. It simply cannot go on like this - it's not fair, they should have gone long ago.

They are inept, incompetent, useless con merchants who charge us all extorted levels of fares which they rise EVERY year without fail, despite the fact that their service get's 10 times worse as time goes on. It cannot continue like this.

Please please please please... get Southeastern OUT!!!!!
attributes.background: We have suffered long enough - Southeastern Trains are a shambolic, disgraceful example of how not to run a train company.
